ExportItemConfig.Query:
SELECT pi.id,pi.short_name,pi.enabled,pi.update_time, c.`code`, c.`amount`, c.`total_amount`, c.`fee`, c.`discount`, c.`integral`, c.`min_level`, c.`min_fee`, begin_time, over_time, c.`need_bind`, lv.name as limit_levelName FROM pm_info pi INNER JOIN pm_coupon c ON c.id = pi.id LEFT JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value=c.min_level AND lv.merchant_id = pi.merchant_id
WHERE pi.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({enabled}<0 OR pi.enabled={enabled}) AND pi.short_name LIKE '%{keyword}%' ORDER BY pi.update_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
